node.name: Decision Making
node.rich_text: Har decision — ek
choice hota hai
• Har baar tu decide karta hai: kya karna hai? kahan focus dena hai? • Ye decision
sirf logical nahi hota
emotions
bhi deeply involved hote hain.
Trolley Problem Example se kya seekhne ko mila?
• Trolley Problem ek imaginary scene hai: ◇ Ek train ja rahi hai — ya to 5 logon ko kuchlega ya agar tu switch dabaye to sirf 1 ko. ◇ Dilemma:
Kisko bachayein?
Log sochne lagte hain ki “bas do hi option hai” — ya left ya right. ❗ Lekin
real hacker mindset
bolta hai: “Ruk — kya main scene change kar sakta hoon?” “Kya aur koi option ban sakta hai?” “Kya main kuch aisa kar sakta hoon jisse sab bach jaayein?”
🎯 Main Message:
Zindagi mein tere decisions limited nahi hain.
Wo
tu khud limit karta hai
— tere beliefs, dar, aur past failures ke wajah se.
⚠️ Common Limiting Thoughts jo tu sochta hoga:
• "Mere paas option hi nahi hai" • "Ye to karna hi padega" • "Mujhse nahi hoga" Par author keh raha hai:
Tumhe kisne kaha ki tum option nahi bana sakte?
